message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $175. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $175 is still too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $187.50?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to pay more than $175 for the product. Thank you for understanding.
